content: I need thee, oh I need thee
Oh bless me now my Saviour
I need thee every hour, most gracious Lord
No tender voice like thine can peace afford.
I need thee every hour, stay thou near by
Temptation lose their power when thou art nigh
I need thee every hour, in joy or in pain
Come quickly and abide, or life is ruin
I need thee every hour, teach me thy will
And thy rich promises in me fulfill
I need thee every hour, most Holy One
Oh! Make me thine indeed, thou blessed child.
